PlugBoard, the flexible framework to create plugin-based applications.

Search site with Google

Note

Some of the following tools need user registration at developer.berlios.de to be used.

Thanks for any help you give us!

community

Currently, these are the active places where you can communicate with other developers freely:

  • Mailing list - here you can discuss about everything you want on PlugBoard

support

For all questions, problems and suggestions you have on this project, you may use the following tools to directly contact all PlugBoard developers:

  • Bug tracker - for application issues, helping us to improve PlugBoard more and more
  • Support tracker - for usage problems and various questions
  • Features requests - for suggesting us new enhancements to apply to PlugBoard

developers

Take in consideration these tools if you decide to contribute by making changes to the product's code:

  • Subversion repository
  • Patches submission

Note

Please visit the project page for all available developer tools and their usage documentation.
